pr_title: chore(atomix): initialize event subscriptions after listener is added

timeline.message: chore(atomix): initialize cluster event subscriptions after listener is added

timeline.bodyText: might make sense to do that in the membershipService#addListener? Because this problem will also arise on other places probably furthermore the membership is in charge to do that I would say.

replies.bodyText: That's right. It would prevent similar bugs in future. It is not the first time we encountered this I guess. That said, is it ok if I do it in another PR? We have to verify if it breaks existing listeners.
replies.author: deepthidevaki

replies.bodyText: Yes then please create a follow up issue 🙂
replies.author: Zelldon
